sentences.cn: 所有归纳推理都是一种猜测.

sentences.en: He made his money in property speculation.
sentences.cn: 他靠房地产投机发了财.

sentences.en: He ventured his fortune in a speculation.
sentences.cn: 他拿他的大宗财产做投机生意.
他因做投机生意而破产.

sentences.en: I am tired of all the speculation.
Mr Wakeham dismissed the reports as speculation.
sentences.cn: 韦克厄姆先生把这些报道当作臆测而不予考虑。

sentences.en: Recently the speculation has reached new heights.
Some stockbrokers, in collusion with bank officials, obtained large sums of money for speculation.
sentences.cn: 一些股票经纪人和银行职员串通一气，通过炒买炒卖赚了不少钱。

sentences.en: Speculation about his future had reached fever pitch .
sentences.cn: 关于他的前途的猜测达到了狂想的地步。

sentences.en: Speculation centred on a likely bid price of 380p a share.
sentences.cn: 大多数人猜测买方出价可能为每股380便士。

sentences.en: Speculation is rife that he will be sacked.
sentences.cn: 人们纷纷猜测他会被解雇。

sentences.en: Speculation was rife as to whom the prince might marry.
sentences.cn: 大家都在推测王子会娶谁.

sentences.en: The group's problems have led to speculation that heads will roll.
sentences.cn: 已经有人猜测，该集团的问题会导致一些人被解雇。

sentences.en: The picture gave rise to speculation that the three were still alive and being held captive.
sentences.cn: 这张照片让人们猜测这3个人还活着，而且被囚禁起来了。

sentences.en: The witness’s statement was pure speculation (= not based on any facts ) .
sentences.cn: 这名证人的陈述纯粹是猜测。

sentences.en: We won't dignify this kind of speculation with a comment.
sentences.cn: 这种猜测不值得我们作任何评论。

words.tran_cn: 投机的；推测的；思索性的
思考,考虑,沉思,深思,脑力劳动
推理,推测,见解,设想,猜测,感觉

trans.tran_cn: 投机买卖，思考，投机活动，推断
trans.tran_en: when you guess about the possible causes or effects of something without knowing all the facts, or the guesses that you make
